result.execSummary:
The defendant Dustin E Zdroik was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.
DNA sample to be provided and surcharge assessed.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dustin E Zdroik

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: 10:53 am case called. Defendant Dustin E Zdroik in court.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court goes over file. Statement by DA Blader regarding resolution-defendant provided letter by treating physician for AODA.   Defendant advised of right to counsel and expertise.  Voluntary waiver of counsel accepted by Court.   Court sentences the defendant to 1 day WCJ, with 1 day credit. Costs to be paid within 60 days or payment plan. DNA Sample and Surcharge ordered by the Court.  Defendant advised of right to expunge DNA record through the Department of Justice. Appeal Rights Given.
Sentencing hearing on December 20, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Case Called @ 1:25 PM: Defendant Dustin E Zdroik in court, in custody, appears via video.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Per DA:  State believes that confirmation on treatment will be forthcoming and requests Signature Bond continue.  SEH rescheduled as requested.  Defendant understands that Warrant is now withdrawn and that he must appeare on 12/20/2016.  Signature Bond to continue.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 20, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Case called @ 2:26 p.m. Defendant Dustin E Zdroik not in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Based on non appearance, the Court authorizes the issuance of a Bench Warrant extraditable within the State of Wisconsin.
Sentencing hearing on November 28, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

Case called @ 3:33 p.m. Defendant Dustin E Zdroik in court.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea QN reviewed w/Defendant. Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained.  Consequences explained for failure to abide by terms of Deferred Sentencing Agreement. Chapter 950 compliance addressed.  Plea: Ct 2 - NC.  Court accepts plea and stays JOC. Ct 1 - DRI. Court accepts terms and conditions of Deferred Sentencing Agreement.  Matter stayed for 6 months.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 28, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
Plea hearing on May 23, 2016 at 03:15 pm.

Case Called @ 11:31 AM: Defendant Dustin E Zdroik in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Per ADA - add'l STC being requested.  Agreement reached in principle with details being worked out.  It is anticipated that there will be a PPDA offered.  Plea Hrg Scheduled - NOH Personally Given.  Plea hearing scheduled for May 23, 2016 at 03:15 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 03-17-2016 09:15 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 04-05-2016 11:30 am.

The defendant must maintain absolute sobriety, may not be present upon the premises of any bars, and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician.    Complete ID process with the Sheriff's Department.

Case Called @ 2:19 PM: Defendant Dustin E Zdroik in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel.  Defendant does not wish counsel today.    NGP received and entered.  ADA argues as to $500 Signature Bond w/conditions.  Def agrees with bond request.   PTC/PS Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 17, 2016 at 09:15 am.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 5, 2016 at 11:30 am.
